name: Escape the Dungeon (Grizoir)
description:
Collect keys, survive the monsters, and get out of the dungeon! Escape the Dungeon is a game created for my thesis, implementing A* (A-Star) pathfinding algorithm on the enemies to make sure they can find wherever you are in the map. It's still in a  early stage of development so it still needs improvement here and there.

Hope you have fun! Cheers.
